sentence: Topline A wave of controversy hitting right-wing firebrand Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) shows no signs of letting up, with a Republican senator on Wednesday calling for an investigation into potential insider trading by the youngest member of Congresshere are the many other troubles he has faced since launching a congressional bid two years ago.
author: Nicholas Reimann
title: A Time Line Of Madison Cawthorn's MisstepsFrom Visiting Nazi Retreat To Wild Orgy Claims

sentence: Topline Rep. Madison Cawthorn's (R-N.C.) tumultuous stretch of personal scandal and legal trouble might be starting to hurt him politically, according to a poll from a national Republican group, which found the controversies have seriously hurt the freshman congressman's image among his constituents.
author: Nicholas Reimann
title: Cawthorn's Reelection Support Plummets After Wave Of Controversy, GOP Poll Finds
